name: The Troma Project
description: Turn based Strategy Game which puts you in the world of Troma. Horror, Trash, Splatter, Sex and Crime - Please take it not too serious! The game was 15 years hidden in the tray - now we found it and release it for Halloween 2015.

Troma the game do i need to say more?
It's not an RPG or even some big epic game. this game is very similar in handling to the original Fallout game, but with complete emphasis on combat

As much as I absolutely love Troma and most of their films, this game really falls on it's face. With such a powerful personality, voices from SGT. Kabukiman, Toxie, and Lloyd Kauffman himself, appearences from Lemmy, Matt and Trey of Baseketball fame, you'll soon realize the gameplay does not deliver.  I played this for a short time, and the only thing it did for me was make me want to purchase Troma films. Maybe that was the idea, who knows.
